All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BasicBlocker
BasicBlocker class provides a basic implementation of a URL blocker by checking the reachability of a given URL.
BlockCommand
The BlockCommand class represents the "block url" command in the commands.
BlockedOption
The BlockedOption class is responsible for building the appropriate BlockerCommand instances based on the provided options string.
BlockedUrlBlocker
The BlockedUrlBlocker class extends BlockerDecorator and implements the BlockerCommand interface, providing a URL blocking mechanism by checking if the URL is in the blocked URLs list.
BlockerCommand
The BlockerCommand interface defines the structure for URL blocking commands.
BlockerDecorator
The BlockerDecorator abstract class implements the BlockerCommand interface and serves as a base class for various URL blocking decorators.
Command
The Command interface represents a command that can be executed by the command-line tool.
CommandLineParser
The CommandLineParser class provides methods for parsing and validating command line input.
CommandManager
The CommandManager class is responsible for managing the available commands in the command-line tool.
CommandValidator
The CommandValidator class provides a method for validating command line input commands.
CookieBlocker
The CookieBlocker class extends BlockerDecorator and implements the BlockerCommand interface, providing a URL blocking mechanism by checking for the presence of cookies in the response header.
DownloadCommand
The DownloadCommand class represents the "download" command in the commands.
ErrorMessages
The ErrorMessages class is a utility class that contains constant strings for various error messages used throughout the application.
HTMLBlocker
The HTMLBlocker class extends BlockerDecorator and implements the BlockerCommand interface, providing a URL blocking mechanism by checking for the presence of HTML content in the response header.
ImageBlocker
The ImageBlocker class extends BlockerDecorator and implements the BlockerCommand interface, providing a URL blocking mechanism by checking for the presence of image content in the response header.
InvalidCommandException
The InvalidCommandException class is a custom exception class that extends the Exception class.
InvalidOptionException
The InvalidOptionException class is a custom exception class that extends the Exception class.
InvalidURLException
The InvalidURLException class is a custom exception class that extends the Exception class.
IOManager
The IOManager class is a singleton utility class responsible for handling file I/O operations such as reading, writing, and appending to files, as well as streaming content from an HttpURLConnection to a file.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for a command-line tool designed to download content from a URL while allowing users to block specific content types.
OptionValidator
The OptionValidator class provides a method for validating command line input options.
PrintCommand
The PrintCommand class represents the "print" command in the commands .
QuitCommand
The QuitCommand class represents the "quit" command in the commands.
QuitException
The QuitException class is a custom exception class that extends the Exception class.
UnblockCommand
The UnblockCommand class represents the "unblock url" command in the commands.
URLValidator
The URLValidator class is a utility class responsible for validating URLs passed to the application.
